LanguageData.RatkinTunnel_Guerrilla.label: tunnel invasion
LanguageData.RatkinTunnel_Guerrilla.letterText: Ground tremors resembling digging were detected.\n\nA special ratkin assault team will soon come up from the ground. Stop them before they can cause damage.
LanguageData.RatkinTunnel_Thief.label: ratkin hole
LanguageData.RatkinTunnel_Thief.letterText: A rat hole has been found.\n\nDestroy it before thieves use it for infiltration.
LanguageData.RatkinFollowUpTroops.label: follow-up unit
LanguageData.RatkinFollowUpTroops.letterText: EMP explosion.\n\nWe need to prepare for the defense.
